string.text: Psihodelik
Useful properties: restores the psi-health, stops the mental effects on the brain, and removes toxins.
the Elite medkomplekt

Elite medical kit, designed specifically for use in the Zone. The set picked up for combat wounds, and for the withdrawal of radionuclides from the body. Prevents the development of radiation sickness and restores energy, and reduces the dose of accumulated radiation.
bandage
Improved bandaging material. Stops bleeding and reduces the radiation level in the blood.
LSD protector

Composition: artificial steroids, Enderlin-B 190, hydrochloride, menadione, metoclopramide, pyridoxine, thiamine, Riboxin and others. Enters into the blood of substances capable of decomposing protein toxins, as well as the absorbents of synthetic poisons. The drug is the most powerful among his kind. The drug is long-acting.
Bag CMB
Is a set of medical equipment and medicines for first aid.
Army messenger bag CMB
Is a set of medical equipment and medicines for first aid in the conduct of special operations.
Bag CMB scientists
Is a set of medical equipment and medicines for first aid in scientific expeditions.
a Special bag CMB
Is a set of medical equipment and medicines for first aid in extreme conditions of the Exclusion Zone.
Cat's eye

the new drug, developed by scientists in the Zone. Increases the pupil to epic proportions, thus allows you to see better in the dark. The drug is the eyes of the Chernobyl Cat. Very popular among the Mercenaries and night patrols of the Debt. Method of use: open package, eat contents. Side effects: temporary loss of vision. Duration - one hour.
Moonshine
Home vodka , swissarena to discover the Area. Contains some special ingredients, which is transmitted from the Stalker to the Stalker.
TGZ-energy

This drink is essentially a mixture of caffeine, B-12 and steroid derived from testosterone in the boar. Prevents fatigue by drastic reduction of lactic acid accumulation in the muscles, allowing you to move more and more actively.
